ELOS-эпиляция основана на сочетании лазе: ELOS hair removal is based on a combination of laser and photoepilation, supplemented by a special technique for protecting the skin during the procedure. A high-frequency pulse of light and current is directed to the treatment area: the current destroys the hair follicle, and high-frequency light pulses act on the hair structure, evenly distributing the temperature along its shaft In turn, this technology increases the depth of impact on the hair follicles by 20-30%, significantly reducing the degree of thermal effect on the surrounding tissues.
наличие нежелательных волос на теле — на: the presence of unwanted hair on the body - on the legs, arms, back, face, chest, in the armpits, in the bikini zone
заболевания крови, приводящие к нарушени: diseases of the blood, leading to a violation of its coagulability
заболевания, повышающие чувствительность: diseases that increase the sensitivity of the skin to light
иммунодефицитные состояния, в том числе: immunodeficiency states, including those caused by the intake of certain drugs
инфекционные заболевания кожи в месте эп: infectious diseases of the skin at the place of epilation
приём лекарств, обладающих фотосенсибили: taking medications that have a photosensitizing effect (information about this is always indicated in the annotation to the drug)
наличие имплантов, имеющих металлические: the presence of implants with metal components in the area of ​​epilation
наличие кохлеарного слухового протеза: the presence of a cochlear hearing prosthesis
келоидные рубцы в зоне эпиляции: keloid scars in the epilation zone
Метод перманентного удаления волос с пом: The method of permanent hair removal using an electric discharge directed directly to the hair follicle. According to the results of clinical studies, electrolysis is the only method of permanent hair removal.
для удаления волос на коже через 8-12 ме: to remove hair on the skin 8-12 months after the treatment of the nevus
для удаления бороды трансгендерным женщи: for beard removal for transgender women
для удаления волос у женщин в качестве с: for hair removal in women as an integral part of the treatment of hirsutism (excessive hair growth)
склонность к образованию келоидных и гип: tendency to form keloid and hyperplastic scars
варикоз в зоне эпиляции: varicose veins in the epilation zone
непереносимость сплавов металлов, входящ: intolerance to metal alloys that are part of the needles
Это революционная методика борьбы со мно: This is a revolutionary method of dealing with many skin imperfections. During the session, the volume of adipose tissue is reduced, the production of collagen and elastin, which are responsible for the firmness and elasticity of skin tissues, is stimulated. The RF-lifting procedure allows you to: even out the relief, correct facial contours, tighten the contour, smooth wrinkles, eliminate bags under the eyes
системные заболевания соединительной тка: systemic diseases of the connective tissue (rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus, vasculitis)
онкологические процессы любой локализаци: oncological processes of any localization and stage
хронические заболевания в стадии обостре: chronic diseases in the acute stage
ELOS-омоложение основывается на уникальн: ELOS rejuvenation is based on a unique combination of two types of energy - light energy and high frequency electric current. With the advent of ELOS technology, it has become possible to have a deeper, and at the same time gentle effect on the skin. As a result, the production of the skin's own elastin complex is stimulated, synthesis of new collagen in its deep layers. This is the same Elos rejuvenation, reviews of which can be heard everywhere today! After all, it is when our skin loses elastin and collagen that it gradually loses its beauty
наличие искусственного стимулятора серде: the presence of an artificial heart pacemaker, a defibrillator or a cochlear implant
онкология кожи или внутренних органов в: oncology of the skin or internal organs in the anamnesis
наличие металлических имплантов в зоне л: the presence of metal implants in the treatment area
иммунодефицитные состояния (СПИД, ВИЧ),: immunodeficiency states (AIDS, HIV), as well as the use of immunosuppressants
красная волчанка, порфирия, эрозия, эрит: lupus erythematosus, porphyria, erosion, erythema, dermatoses
сильный загар в течение последних 4 неде: strong sunburn during the last 4 weeks before treatment
прием фотосенсибилизирующих препаратов в: taking photosensitizing drugs during the last 2 weeks before elos-rejuvenation, retinoids in the last 6 months before the procedure
Лазерный карбоновый пилинг - это космети: Laser Carbon Peeling is a cosmetic machine procedure. Also known as «carbon peeling» due to the use of a special carbon (carbon dioxide) based nanogel. This is a two-component treatment that instantly reduces skin problems such as acne, bacteria and pigmentation, promotes the production of its own collagen and makes the skin more elastic.
жирная кожа с признаками акне и постакне: oily skin with signs of acne and post-acne
угревая сыпь, комедоны (не в активной ст: acne, comedones (not in the active stage)
нормальная и комбинированная кожа с мелк: normal and combination skin with small wrinkles
